resources.string: Allows shake to rotate when On
Background service will be started on device start.
Less sensitivity means stronger shakes are needed.
How many shakes approximately you need to rotate the screen
Tap on menu in top-right corner for more help. Please check the About as well!
Shake the phone along X and Y to change orientation and along Z axis to switch tilt/shake.
Example: Turn on the service and switch to Shake mode. Then hold the phone in landscape and shake up and down (X axis). Landscape will be locked in all apps that have no orientation preference.
Example2: Turn on the service and shake the phone towards/away (Z axis) from yourself to switch between shake and tilt control.
See screenshots in the store for more help.
Toggle Tilt/Shake has same effect as Auto-Rotation setting On/Off. When the service is off, shaking has no effect. Use the buttons for manual control.

Note that the orientation enforcement works only in apps, that do not have any orientation preference. It works in browsers, some movie players, facebook etc. But it does not work in games and on home screen.
